record.field: Important: Reminder Regarding Product to Return

Dear ,

This email is a friendly reminder regarding the that was due for return. Our records indicate that the product has not yet been returned.

As per our rental/return policy, a daily late fee will be applied for each day the product is overdue.

To avoid any additional charges, please return the product as soon as possible.

If you have already returned the product, please disregard this email. However, if you believe there has been an error, or if you require an extension, please contact us immediately so we can assist you.

We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
